Page12.Title: Oct 1, 19xx
Page12.Left: I find myself troubled by a DREAM of late. It started a few weeks ago, but now its a nightly experience. I have started dreading the call of sleep for I know the DREAM is all that is waiting. In the DREAM I find myself lost in a damp darkness, the surrounding silence is broken by faint whispers and slithering.
Page12.Right: I'm gripped with fear before suddenly awakening, but the DREAM seems to grow longer with each passing night...

Page34.Title: Oct 8, 19xx
Page34.Left: The DREAM has evolved further. There is now a dimly lit temple that seems to be the source of the whispering. When I venture inside, I am greeted by a statue of some creature. It has the head and torso of a man, yet in place of limbs are tentacles. The whispers start to grow louder and I can hear them mention a KEY.
Page34.Right: At the base of the statue is a large KEY.  When I reach for it, the statue animates and grips me, a terrifying visage appears on its torso, and screams. What does this KEY mean...
